title: 有哪些可以增加游戏难度的mod呢？大佬们有推荐吗？awa
author: 天天之怒
txt_content: 如标题所说，求几个加游戏难度的mod，最好出门就能死死死的那种awa。

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 九耀龙翔 于 2020-2-28 13:38 编辑 

Scaling Health https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/scaling-health生存时间越长，怪物血量伤害越高
bloodmoon https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/bloodmoon
血月，刷新大量的怪
Lycanites Mobs https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/lycanites-mobs
恐怖生物，加了一堆怪
AtomicStryker's Infernal Mobs https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... ykers-infernal-mobs
给怪物加一堆属性
Special AI https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/special-ai
加强怪物的AI
Rough Mobs 2 https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/rough-mobs-2
加强怪物
Grimoire of Gaia https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/grimoire-of-gaia
盖亚魔典
Hostile Worlds - Invasions https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... le-worlds-invasions
每隔几天怪物就会入侵
Consecration https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/consecration

亡灵生物必须用燃烧或亡灵杀手才能造成正常伤害

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
[1.14.4-1.7.2][InfernalMobs——精英怪物]一大波特技怪物！
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-592395-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

抖M？

replies.author: 凛夜丶雨月
replies.txt_content:
精英怪，血月，僵尸意识
血月最好弄成100%，一出门你就没了，满足要求给波金粒呗

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
天天之怒 发表于 2020-2-28 13:26
需要更多呢awa
你还需要多少
